mapper.select:
select a.memberSeq, a.memberID, a.memberPwd, a.memberName, a.memberGenderCd, a.memberTypeCd, a.memberAddr, a.memberDelNy, a.memberRegDate, a.memberModDate
order by a.memberSeq limit 99999999999
mapper.insert: insert into member ( memberID, memberPwd, memberName, memberGenderCd, memberTypeCd, memberAddr, memberDelNy, memberRegDate, memberModDate ) values ( #{memberID}, #{memberPwd}, #{memberName}, #{memberGenderCd}, #{memberTypeCd}, #{memberAddr}, #{memberDelNy}, now(), now() );
mapper.update:
update member set memberID=#{memberID}, memberPwd=#{memberPwd}, memberName=#{memberName}, memberGenderCd=#{memberGenderCd}, memberTypeCd=#{memberTypeCd}, memberAddr=#{memberAddr}, memberDelNy=#{memberDelNy}, memberRegDate=now(), memberModDate=now()
where 1=1 and memberSeq=#{memberSeq}
update member set memberDelNy=1 where 1=1 and memberSeq=#{memberSeq}
mapper.delete: delete from member where 1=1 and memberSeq=#{memberSeq}
mapper.select:
select a.memberSeq, a.memberName
from member a where 1=1 and a.memberDelNy=0 order by a.memberSeq desc

select a.memberSeq, a.memberName
from member a where 1=1 and a.memberDelNy=0 and a.memberTypeCd=3 order by a.memberSeq desc

select a.memberSeq, a.memberName
from member a where 1=1 and a.memberDelNy=0 and a.memberTypeCd=2 order by a.memberSeq desc

select memberSeq, memberName, memberID, memberPwd, memberGenderCd, memberTypeCd, memberAddr, memberDelNy, memberRegDate, memberModDate
from member where memberID = #{memberID}
